data.meta_description: Tiempos Text is a modern serif for economic and legible typesetting. Test the free fonts, see them in use, read about their design and buy for Desktop, Web & App.
data.text: The Tiempos Collection is a modern serif family for editorial typography. Tiempos Text takes the functionality of Plantin and Times, gently updating it for contemporary use. Itâs robust and clear, perfect for economic and legible typesetting. Tiempos Headline is designed for larger headline sizes, striking a balance between practicality and elegance. Tiempos Fine keeps the proportions and letterfit of Tiempos Headline, and intensifies the interplay between warm curves and sharp details.
